articles.title: The Corn is Green, review: Nicola Walker is unmissable in this riveting production - The Telegraph

articles.title: Queen visits horses at Sandringham the day after her birthday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Wearing one of her signature headscarves, Her Majesty, 96, was seen in the front passenger seat of a Range Rover leaving Wood Farm near Sandringham in Norfolk.
articles.content:
The Queen's love of horses is a lifelong passion, so it was no surprise that Her Majesty took the opportunity to visit the stables today during her break at Sandringham.
